#labels Usage
  # Clone the project from git using:
       _git clone https://git@github.com/jayway/powermock.git_
  # Check out version 1.5.5:
       _git checkout powermock-1.5.5_
  # Step into the `examples/tutorial/`folder and follow the instructions in the [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jayway/powermock/master/examples/tutorial/readme.txt readme.txt] file.
